job.title: REMOTE Risk Data Engineer Work(with python and Tableau exp.)
job.industry: Information Services,Information Technology and Services,Financial Services
job.description: <p><strong>Description:</strong>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</p><ul><li>Skills equiv. to 1-2 years in comparable position.&nbsp;</li><li>Responsible for Financial Risk Management application development using Python, SQL, and Tableau.&nbsp;</li><li>Must be able to apply SDLC concepts and have a proven track record of delivering solid, robust applications.&nbsp;</li><li>Must have a good understanding of financial reporting and analysis automation. Must have strong interpersonal, analytical, problem solving and organizational skills, and the ability to independently work as a contributing member in a high-paced and focused team.</li></ul>
